What is your political ideology?
Your Result: Christian Democrat
 
77%
Christian democrats are paternal conservatives who generally support a free market economy with limited state intervention. Many also support corporatism, in which workers and employers work through collective bargaining agreements to cooperate and improve conditions for both. Socially, Christian democrats tend to be moderate conservatives, being in opposition to same-sex marriage and abortion while also opposing secularism to some degree. They tend to value the family and believe that it has its own individual autonomy in society.
